# MMSService.Error.mmsNotReady

**Case**

The framework isn’t ready to send MMS messages.

## Declaration

```swift
case mmsNotReady
```

## Discussion

You can handle this error by making another attempt to send the MMS message later.

## Identifying errors

- **MMSService.Error.unknown**: An unknown problem caused the error.
- **MMSService.Error.notSupported**: The operation isn’t supported.
- **MMSService.Error.invalidRecipient**: The message contained one or more unknown or malformed recipients.
- **MMSService.Error.invalidMessageParts**: The message conteined one or more unknown or malformed parts.
- **MMSService.Error.internalError**: The framework encountered an unknown internal error.
- **MMSService.Error.mmsNotConfiguredForCarrier**: The carrier isn’t currently configured to handle MMS.
- **MMSService.Error.maximumSizeExceeded**: The MMS message exceeded the maximum allowed size.
